profile_positions.description:
• Foundation laid for Industry 4.0
• Integration of appliance test software to one platform
• Consolidation of appliance test data and production data to one back-end
• World Class Manufacturing core team member
profile_positions.title: Senior Industrial Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Some noteworthy projects and solutions:

• Full design, implementation and IP ownership of a cloud based distributed IIoT solution, designed to contain no single point of failure, which stores and processes production and process data for multiple customers in near real-time. The data store contains an estimated one billion records and grows with roughly one million data records each day.

• Full design, implementation and IP ownership of an AI powered grading, batching and sorting software solution which can sort, grade and batch products in the food industry based on weight, automatic visual appearance and quality indicators with a speed in excess of 15000 products per hour per sorting line.

• Full design, implementation and IP ownership of a supply chain planning system for livestock, which automatically adapts its forecast based on historic growth rates, real time growth data, incidents and production planning.

• Automatic crane, capable of loading and unloading trucks with one operation. Accountable for the design, development and implementation of the control software.

• Multiple full redesigns of control cabinets and software of mega-Watt size cold store machine rooms to increase power efficiency and reduce the energy footprint. Responsible for all electrical and software changes and documentation.

• Multiple full redesigns of waste water treatment plants to improve the process itself and the resulting water quality. In one plant causing the sludge settling time to be reduced from several hours to three minutes. Responsible for the biochemical research, process design and software implementation.
profile_positions.title: Owner - Inventor - Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Coaching local peasants to transform their farm into an ecotourism resort
• Marketing the resort and their services world-wide
• Development of itineraries, standard tours and individual arrangements
• Contract management with foreign companies and individuals
• Prepared local workers for a full management take-over

Achievement:
The destination was featured twice in the in-flight magazine of Kazakhstan's national airline Air Astana.
profile_positions.title: Business Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Invited by Google for a volunteer role to roll out a world-wide community contribution framework for Google Maps. Google Map Maker is the predecessor of the current Google Local Guides program. Role ended due to the shutdown of the Google Map Maker program on March 31st 2017.

• Community lead in Russian, English and Dutch language forums
• Liaison between the community and the product/engineering team
• Conference speaker on multiple international conferences and events
• Power mapper responsible for a large share of Google's map contents of Kazakhstan
• Reviewer responsible for approvals of user edits in the Netherlands and Kazakhstan
• Trusted tester of new developments
profile_positions.title: Map Maker Advocate

profile_positions.description:
WebmasterWorld is one of the oldest webmaster discussion boards on the internet. In its prime it was the largest and most active webmaster community in the world. Stepped down as moderator to avoid a potential conflict of interest with a new role at Google.

• Moderator in the Linux/Unix forum
• Moderator in the Website Technology Issues forum
• Active contributor for almost two decades, still in the all-time top 100 contributors list
profile_positions.title: Forum Moderator

profile_positions.description:
Driving force behind keeping the company at the cutting edge (literally) in shipbuilding. Noteworthy activities:

• Project lead in adding a from scratch developed automatic marking and cutting station to the automatic profile bending production line to produce finished ship trusses without manual processing.

• Project lead in rolling out an industrial TCP/IP data network spanning all CNC and DNC machines in all production halls, replacing an existing packet switched RS232 network. The network included automatic ISDN routing to production facilities in Bremen (D) Stralsund (D) and Singapore.

• Project lead in implementing high-speed ink-jetting for marking lines and texts, as a full replacement for zinc powder flame spraying and handwritten numbers.

• Accountable for the design and development of the first working post processor to translate CAM files to cutting files for the first generation ESAB plasma bevel cutting machines.

• Accountable for the design and development from scratch of the work preparation and production flow software for the acquired straight profile production location of the bankrupt Bremer Vulkan shipyard, resulting in a doubling of the output speed with only 60% of the previous staff.

• Accountable for the design and development of new product life cycle management and MES software to replace the MES layer of a not-millennium proof ERP system.

• Conversion of more than a million product data files in various formats, including many which were still on punch tapes, to the data store of the new PLM/MES software.

• Team member in projects to open new production facilities in Stralsund and Singapore.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Graduation assignment, followed by a full-time job in the development and implementation of a fully automatic profile bending production line for the shipbuilding industry.

• Accountable for the design an development of the control software/hardware
• Accountable for the design and development of the work preparation software
• Accountable for the modelling of the physics behind bending heavy metal beams
• Shared responsibility for additions improvements in the hydraulic and electrical designs
• Shared responsibility for the proof-of-concept stage milestones
• Shared responsibility for the transformation to a fully functional production line.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer
